name: Datastoxx
desc: Public, web, and various other datasets focused on estimating company expenses in the transportation and trucking sector.
full_ticker_coverage: JBHT, KNX, ODFL, XPO, SNDR, WERN, HTLD
dataset_coverage_start: We have various datasets and therefore the dataset lookback will fluctuate. The dataset with the longest coverage starts in 2011.
advantages: Datastoxx focuses on Expense-related data whereas most alternative data providers focus on Revenue.
